li.p: Download Couchbase Server and install it. Make sure to install the beer-sample data set when you run the wizard because this tutorial application works with it.
Clone the repository and install dependencies (express, jade):
li.codeblock: shell> git clone git://github.com/couchbaselabs/beersample-node Cloning into 'beersample-node' #... shell> cd beersample-node shell> npm install
shell> node beer.js Server running at http://127.0.0.1:1337/

li.p: Navigate to http://localhost:1337/welcome, and enjoy the application!
